feed.title: Gaseous Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Update for PlatformMap.json to add missing core support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/318
  • Hide unneeded buttons from the emulator by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/324

Bug Fixes

  • Error on startup when reading value LastRun_BackgroundDatabaseUpgrade by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/319
  • Ensure ROMs are decompressed before loading them into a media group by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/321
  • New library dialog content overruns the edges of the dialog by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/323
  • Infinite Scrolling breaks clicking the Gaseous Games logo to return to library by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/326
  • SQL error when loading the library with the MySQL database server by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/327
  • When fixing matches, search doesn't return the correct values by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/330

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Integrate EJS 4.0.12 - Adds a new Master System core, and a new DS core by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/343

Bug Fixes

  • Performance improvements to infinite scrolling by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/347

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Change license from GPL to AGPL by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/355
  • Provide ability to upload save states by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/371
  • Build a docker image that includes an embedded MariaDB server by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/373
  • Added extra logging when generating hashes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/376
  • Add Famicom to PlatformMap by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/384
  • Unraid compatible single container docker image by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/390

Bug Fixes

  • Fix for first time start where new users weren't offered the opportunity to create a new account by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/372
  • Resolved many database errors by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/377
  • Improved maintenance tasks by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/378
  • Removed Hasheous POC - full Hasheous support will be available in 1.8.0 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/379

Dependencies

  • chore(deps): bump Magick.NET-Q8-AnyCPU from 13.7.0 to 13.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/356
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi from 8.0.4 to 8.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/357
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI from 8.0.4 to 8.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/358
  • chore(deps): bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore from 6.5.0 to 6.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.3...v1.7.4

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Expand the platform table name field to accomodate larger platform names by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/397

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.4...v1.7.5

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.6
entry.content:
NOTE: This release is a bug fix release for the importing of MAME/MESS DATs. For existing users, instructions can be found in the Wiki on how to re-import the MAME/MESS DATs.

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed import of MAME style DATs by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/400

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.5...v1.7.6
